altername_name: Boulder Dash Junior VI: Untested Area
name: Boulder Dash Junior VI
overview: Released for Halloween 2021 with some dangerous rockslide areas and lots of new caves to explore. Intended as a trainer for young children these Junior Boulder Dash games can teach the youngsters of age and heart how to become a BoulderHead. Remember, some of the things you will learn is how NOT to be greedy, get your diamonds and get to the next level.
